publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2550 Brian Adam: Donald Whyte, Genealogistâ€”That the Parliament applauds the significant role played by Donald Whyte in encouraging the development of family history and genealogy in Scotland and calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to recognise in the new Parliament building the importance of researching family history in preserving Scotland's culture and heritage. Supported by: Margaret Smith*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Sandra White*, Michael Russell*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Fergus Ewing*, Colin Campbell*

S1M-2550 Brian Adam: Donald Whyte, Genealogist-That the Parliament applauds the significant role played by Donald Whyte in encouraging the development of family history and genealogy in Scotland and calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to recognise in the new Parliament building the importance of researching family history in preserving Scotland's culture and heritage. Supported by: Margaret Smith, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Murray Tosh, Fergus Ewing, Colin Campbell, Fiona McLeod*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Tricia Marwick*, Irene McGugan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) David Mundell*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2550 Donald Whyte, Genealogist (lodged on 13 December 2001) Donald Gorrie*
